  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Masa-vzmet nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">The mass-spring oscillator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Masse-Frühling Oszillator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'oscillateur de masse-ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O oscilador da massa-mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'oscillatore della massa-molla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ταλαντωτής μάζα-ελατηρίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oscilador del masa-resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Opis nihala na principu masa-vzmet, pogoji za ravnovesje nihala pri spremenljivi zunanji sili in trenju ter energije pri nihanju.</string>
            <string language="en">Description of pendulum based on mass-spring system, conditions for harmonic motion when external force and friction are present.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">resonanca</string>
            <string language="en">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravnovesje</string>
            <string language="en">equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibung des Pendels basiert auf 
Masse-Frühling System, Bedingungen für harmonische Bewegung, wenn 
externe Kraft und Friktion anwesend sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Description de pendule basée sur le système de 
masse-ressort, conditions pour le mouvement harmonique quand la force 
et le frottement externes sont présents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descrição do pêndulo baseada no sistema da 
massa-mola, condições para o movimento harmonic quando a força e a 
fricção externas estiverem atuais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione del pendolo basata sul sistema della 
massa-molla, termini per movimento armonico quando la forza e 
l'attrito esterni sono presenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφή του εκκρεμούς βασισμένη στο σύστημα 
μάζα-ελατηρίων, όροι για την αρμονική κίνηση όταν η εξωτερικές 
δύναμη και η τριβή είναι παρούσες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descripción del péndulo basada en el sistema 
del masa-resorte, condiciones para el movimiento armónico cuando la 
fuerza y la fricción externas están presentes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resonanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichgewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equilíbrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendolo armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risonanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρμονικό εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντήχηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισορροπία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">péndulo armónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resonancia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">equilibrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
